dct_title_s: Plan of the Bay and Harbour of Trincomalay on the island of Ceylon : surveyed in 1762 by the order of Admiral Cornish
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:34,000 (E 81°11'02"--E 81°20'51"/N 8°38'07"--N 8°27'09"). Relief shown by landforms. Depths shown by soundings. Includes text, coastal profiles, detailed navigation instructions, and information on tides.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dcat_keyword_sm: Trincomalee (Sri Lanka) Maps Early Works to 1800
